summary: This is a retexturing of the Divine Aegis armor created by Sader and Shodan44.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/103363-1342765080.jpg[/img]

                       [size=\"20\"][i][b][color=\"#FFFF00\"]NOW INCLUDES ALL MOD FILES[/color][/b][/i] 

VERSION 1.0c
*Replaced undercoat or padding with chainmail for even better aesthetics.

VERSION 1.0b
*Fixed female helmet as well as a few minor aesthetic adjustments.
*Now contains all files required. You will still need to visit the original mod for any major updates.
  I will only update the textures as needed. 

[i][b]Description:[/b][/i][/size]
After receiving several request and taking a small break I\'ve decided to release this reworking. This is an alternative retexturing of the Divine Aegis armor that gives it a bit more of a gritty look as well as somewhat reducing the shine effect. The textures have been meticulously re-worked with HD metallic textures to give the armor more detail.  This is merely an alternative for those wanting a somewhat grittier look. I am still working on a few elements and will update as necessary. I did not touch the cape or sword. Only the armor and shield have been reworked. 

[size=\"14\"][i][b]Installation:[/b][/i][/size]
Simply use NMM or just unzip and place the data folder into your Skyrim installation.

[size=\"14\"][i][b]Requirements:[/b][/i][/size]
For any updates to the Divine Aegis Mod you must go here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9109

[size=\"14\"][i][b]Compatibility Issues:[/b][/i][/size]
None what so ever.

[size=\"14\"][i][b]Known Issues:[/b][/i][/size]
There is still some measure of bright reflection when near lights such as campfires and torches. This is something still being worked on but the shine from the orginal has been toned down by a fair amount. The armor still retains its detail in direct sunlight and is not as washed out as before so there has been considerable progress. But again, all these factors may vary depending on the lighting system or ENB you use. Should be fine with most any set up but just saying just incase.

[size=\"14\"][i][b]Quick Faq:[/b][/i][/size]
Q:  Any plans to rework the sword?
A:  No, my main focus was to work on the armor itself. Anything beyond that you would have to 
     speak with Sader.

Q:  Does this come with the cloak seen in the screenshots?
A:  No. this mod contains the cloak from the original mod. I use the WIC cloaks as a matter of
     personal choice.

Q:  Any plans for future updates?
A:  No definitive plans but as I mentioned before, I will keep experimenting and possibly update as 
     warranted.

[color=\"#98FB98\"][size=\"14\"][i][b]Credits:[/b][/i][/size][/color]
Thanks to Sader and Shodan44 for their hard work and initial design.
author: Jerros
